name: Tableau Webhooks Manager
description: An internal Tableau hackathon project for a Tableau webhooks manager.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Make sure this matches the app name you entered above EXACTLY.

SERVER.description: Your Tableau Server/Online address. Example: https://www.myserver.com

VERSION.description: The Tableau REST API version for your Server.

SITE_NAME.description: Your initial Tableau site content URL. Required if using Tableau Online
